metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8364 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Integer overflow in the ff_ivi_init_planes function in libavcodec/ivi.c in FFmpeg before 2.6.5, 2.7.x before 2.7.3, and 2.8.x through 2.8.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds heap-memory access) or possibly have unspecified other impact via crafted image dimensions in Indeo Video Interactive data.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> no equivalent fix in libav as of 2016-03-31 in precise, code is in ivi_common.c ebarretto> as of 2018-09-27, no equivalent fix in libav

criterions.comment: libav: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
